title: Nova Scotia closing all visitor information centres - HalifaxToday.ca
description: Nova Scotia closing all visitor information centres HalifaxToday.ca Three presumptive COVID-19 cases in Nova Scotia CTV News Nova Scotia lobster processors call for a halt to harvesting as market for shellfish collapses amid COVID-19 pandemic The Globe and Ma…
content: Due to concerns around COVID all visitor information centres will be closed effective Tuesday March There are only a few centres open year round including one in Amherst near the New Brunswick border and one at Halifax Stanfield International Airpo chars
